__e: I'm going to take your moody silence as a "yes".
Why didn't you? Well, I thought you were telling me something with your silence.
When you are gone, he will feel your silence like a draft.
I'm trying really hard to be... patiently submissive here, but this steely silence thing is... is... just about to cross the line between self-empowerment and douchebaggery.
Accept it from me... that in silence is my safety, under the law.
The only way in which to defend oneself from the silence is to tell the truth.
